subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: George Frazier was the first pitcher in major league history to lose three games in a best-of-seven World Series. On Sunday, he will make his first appearance at Old-Timers’ Day in the Bronx.
snippet: George Frazier was the first pitcher in major league history to lose three games in a best-of-seven World Series. On Sunday, he will make his first appearance at Old-Timers’ Day in the Bronx.
